mapper.update: update l_hazardtype set hazardtypeid=hazardtypeid ,hazardtypecode=#{hazardtypecode} ,hazardtypename=#{hazardtypename} where hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid}

update l_hazardtype set hazardtypeid=hazardtypeid ,hazardtypecode=#{hazardtypecode} ,hazardtypename=#{hazardtypename} where 1=1 and hazardtypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and hazardtypeid =#{Where_Id} and hazardtypeid=#{Where_hazardtypeid} and hazardtypecode=#{Where_hazardtypecode} and hazardtypename=#{Where_hazardtypename}
mapper.select: select t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.hazardtypecode "hazardtypecode", t.hazardtypename "hazardtypename" from l_hazardtype t where hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid}

select t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.hazardtypecode "hazardtypecode", t.hazardtypename "hazardtypename" from l_hazardtype t where 1=1 and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.hazardtypecode=#{hazardtypecode} and t.hazardtypename=#{hazardtypename}

select t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.hazardtypecode "hazardtypecode", t.hazardtypename "hazardtypename" from l_hazardtype t where 1=1 and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.hazardtypecode=#{hazardtypecode} and t.hazardtypename=#{hazardtypename}
mapper.delete: delete from l_hazardtype where 1=1 and hazardtypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and hazardtypeid =#{Where_Id} and hazardtypeid=#{Where_hazardtypeid} and hazardtypecode=#{Where_hazardtypecode} and hazardtypename=#{Where_hazardtypename}
mapper.select: select t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.hazardtypecode "hazardtypecode", t.hazardtypename "hazardtypename" from l_hazardtype t where 1=1 and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.hazardtypecode=#{hazardtypecode} and t.hazardtypename=#{hazardtypename}
select count(*) from l_hazardtype t where 1=1 and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.hazardtypeid!=#{NoId} and t.hazardtypecode=#{hazardtypecode} and t.hazardtypename=#{hazardtypename}
